channel.title: Projects on Chirag Talwar
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Chirag Talwar

item.title: Project 1: Ice Cream Revenue Estimator
item.description: Created a tool that estimates the Ice Cream revenue at varying temperatures Imported dataset from kaggle with 500 data points Engineered feature to remove Null Values and imbalancement Used Linear Regression to predict Ice cream Revenue at different temperatures Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project 2: Google Play Store Analysis
item.description: Performed a comprehensive analysis of apps and reviews on Google play store for over ten thousand apps. Used the data to do data cleaning, exploration and find popularity of apps based on 13 features. Used sentimental analysis on user reviews. Link to GitHub Repository
